description: Try our easy to follow Chicken & Grape Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Grape,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chicken & Grape Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g chicken thigh fillets, cut into 2cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Finely grate lemon rind into a bowl. Add in oil, garlic, rosemary, oregano and chilli. Add chicken, stirring well to coat. Marinate for 30 minutes or overnight if time permits.

Alternately thread chicken, grapes and spring onion onto eight skewers (use metal skewers or bamboo ones that have been soaked in water to prevent burning). Preheat a chargrill or barbecue on medium-high heat. Cook skewers for 6-8 minutes, turning until golden and cooked through.
Meanwhile, cut grated lemon into wedges. Transfer skewers to a platter and serve with lemon wedges.
